Package src.main.java

Class InstanceFetcher

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.InstanceFetcher
public class InstanceFetcher extends Object
Class for fetching instances and their associated classes from an ontology model.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs an InstanceFetcher and initializes the ontology model with the given file contents and extension.

  • Constructor Details

    • InstanceFetcher

      public InstanceFetcher(String fileContents, String extension)
      Constructs an InstanceFetcher and initializes the ontology model with the given file contents and extension.
      Parameters:
      fileContents - the contents of the ontology file as a string
      extension - the file extension indicating the RDF format
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given file extension is not supported

  • Method Details

    • getClassUris

      public Collection<String> getClassUris()
      Retrieves all unique class URIs from the ontology model.
      Returns:
      a collection of class URIs

    • getInstanceUris

      public Collection<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<String,String>> getInstanceUris(String classUri)
      Retrieves all instance URIs and their labels for a given class URI.
      Parameters:
      classUri - the URI of the class
      Returns:
      a collection of pairs containing instance URIs and their labels

    • getClassAndInstanceUris

      public org.apache.jena.ext.com.google.common.collect.Multimap<String,org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<String,String>> getClassAndInstanceUris()
      Retrieves all classes and their instances along with the instance labels.
      Returns:
      a multimap containing class URIs as keys and pairs of instance URIs and labels as values

      public static void main(String[] args)
